arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Borussia Mönchengladbach 1-1 Eintracht Frankfurt
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt and Borussia Mönchengladbach played out a 1-1 draw to round of the Saturday games in the Bundesliga. A game of two halves (in the first half) as Gladbach…

arts.ttl: Gladbach and Frankfurt play out tense draw
arts.sum: Borussia Mönchengladbach and Eintracht Frankfurt played out an enthralling 1-1 draw at Borussia Park, with Hugo Ekitike responding for Die Adler after a Tim Kleindienst opener for the hosts.

arts.ttl: Nathaniel Brown earns place on Eintracht Frankfurt’s Europa League squad
arts.sum: Surging Germany U21 international Nathaniel Brown is the big winner in Eintracht Frankfurt's newly re-organized Europa League roster.

arts.ttl: Borussia Mönchengladbach vs Eintracht Frankfurt preview: European contenders go head-to-head
arts.sum: In a match that could play a decisive role in the race for European qualification, Borussia Mönchengladbach host Eintracht Frankfurt at Borussia-Park on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Michy Batshuayi cites Arthur Theate as one reason for joining Eintracht Frankfurt
arts.sum: New blockbuster Eintracht Frankfurt signing Michy Batshuayi formally spoke to members of the assembled media at a Thursday press conference.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt target ‘Arjen Robben type’ winger as summer planning begins
arts.sum: Bild reports that Eintracht Frankfurt are already planning their summer business and are looking for a winger who is similar to Arjen Robben. Die Adler is well stocked in the striker…

arts.ttl: Preview: Borussia Monchengladbach vs. Eintracht Frankfurt - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Borussia Monchengladbach and Eintracht Frankfurt, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
